column4: I am installing 10.04 server but after the install, I get no output to the monitor.  Any ideas?
it installed ok or any errors?
you do know server is just cli, right so  you will just see name flashing
press ctrl+alt+f2 , get anything?
any place to login?
when   you start pc, do you get a boot menu where you can choose recovery mode?
not hp recovery, talking bout ubuntu recovery, it install grub menu
as in?
can you try something for me?
when you reboot your system, keep shift key pressed, and tell me if ubuntu menu appears giving you option to enter recovery
ok great ,are you in recovery?
ok you are in shel  right , depending upon the server type you choose
you can also install gnome / gui on it if you like !!
I did not get to the shell after selecting recovery
it gives you option to drop to root shell or continue
no options after selecting recovery, just blank screen
hmm still blank?
did you run an md5sum on image before actually burning it to cd
yep, still blank.  no I did not, I just downloaded and burned the iso.  Is it a bad download?
it could be, what pc is it? acer?
HP.  I am using a lenovo to prepare everything (download and burn) but the HP is the final destination
nothing else i can think of sorry :)
winmd5sum shows the iso image is good.  Thanks for the help.  I will keep trying
